circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Robert Preston was found in the Ohio River at the Markland Locks and Dam in Warsaw KY on March 11, 2015.  He had his wallet and id on his person.  He was wearing blue jeans, brown work boots, t shirt, and navy blue hooded sweatshirt.

physicalFeatureDescriptions.description: numerous tattoos of Skulls and knives, back of left arm "slow" and back of right arm "pain" , upside down star in middle of back

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Decedent was found in a make-shift tent along the Kanawha River bank in Charleston, WV.  Possible first name of "Earl" and a possible veteran.

physicalFeatureDescriptions.description: A 7 1/2 inch vertical linear scar extends downwards across the midline chest.

Grim reaper on right bicep, tasmanian devil on center upper chest area, grim reaper on left bicep, entire back with castle and pegasus, skull on right upper thigh, unidentified figure on left anterior wrist area
